articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: The Witcher 4 tech demo ran on a base PS5 to ‘show how much we can optimize’ - The Verge
articles.description: During the State of Unreal showcase, CD Projekt Red showed off an impressive demo for The Witcher 4, built using Unreal Engine 5.
articles.content:
The Unreal Engine 5 demo isnt technically a part of the final game, but it should give a good idea of what to expect.

articles.title: How to watch Apple’s WWDC 2025 keynote - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is expected to unveil changes to its operating systems iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS at its Worldwide Developers Conference.
articles.content:
Apple is hosting its 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference from June 9 to 13. The keynote for this developer-focused event is scheduled for June 9 at 10 a.m. PT / 1 p.m. ET.

articles.title: Exercise improves colon cancer survival, high-quality trial finds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Any type of aerobic exercise works for the improvements, study finds.
